Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at Western/14th
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Western, Cermak, Marshall and Ogden due to street blockage near Western/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.
